SEARCH

Package pkgUnitConverter

package pkgUnitConverter
This package contains a Strategy Design Pattern approach to unit conversion using various classes and an interface.
Since:
19.0.1
  • Class
    Description
    CFconverter
    Class to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit using implemented methods from the UnitConverter Interface
    DRconverter
    Class to convert Degrees to Radians using implemented methods from the UnitConverter Interface
    FCconverter
    Class to convert Fahrenheit to Celsius using implemented methods from the UnitConverter Interface
    RDconverter
    Class to convert Radians to Degrees using implemented methods from the UnitConverter Interface
    Unit
    Class Unit is designed to represent an arbitrary unit that is to be converted using the UnitCoverter interface that is implemented by various other classes.
    UnitConverter
    Interface UnitConverter, is designed to convert various units of measurement contains to methods to be implemented.
